TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit VisualStateChangedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

Docs.summary: Provides data for the and events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When the <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup> that raises the event is set on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of a control, the <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateChangedEventArgs.Control%2A> property is the control that owns the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>. When the <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup> is set on a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> that is not in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, the <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateChangedEventArgs.Control%2A> property is `null` and you should use the <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateChangedEventArgs.StateGroupsRoot%2A> property.

Docs.summary: Gets the element that is transitioning states.
Docs.value: The element that is transitioning states if the is in a ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks When the <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup> is set on a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> that is not in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, the <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateChangedEventArgs.Control%2A> property is `null` and you should use the <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateChangedEventArgs.StateGroupsRoot%2A> property.

Docs.summary: Gets the state that the element is transitioning to or has transitioned to.
Docs.value: The state that the element is transitioning to or has transitioned to.

Docs.summary: Gets the state that the element is transitioning to or has transitioned from.
Docs.value: The state that the element is transitioning to or has transitioned from.

Docs.summary: Gets the root element that contains the .
Docs.value: The root element that contains the .
